attributes.action: force the issue and hold a referendum to join the euro or not.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In this current state of economic uncertainty, surely now is the time to decide once and for all if we will join the euro. There are many arguments for and against, but we live with the constant thought of "will we won't we". Now is the time for the people of this country to decide!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
